h1-subheading: WIMMA Lab offers your company a venue to network and recruit excellent students in a relaxed informal atmosphere.
h2-companies: What makes WIMMA Lab so special?
p-what-is-wimma-lab: In other words, why should your company be well represented to this group of students?
h2-how-to-participate: Ways to get involved in WIMMA Lab
p-how-to-participate: Does your company need new talents, or do you want to come and tell us how enjoyable it is to work in your workplace? Is there a thesis topic in your company without an author? The WIMMA Lab is attended by a wide range of students each year and some only have an internship and a thesis to do.
p-assignment: If your company has fresh idea, or an existing product that you want to improve, you can suggest it to WIMMA Lab as an assignment. You get to run a virtual company where students develop an idea further and produce working prototypes and proof-of-concepts during the summer.
p-even-sponsorship: Tarjoa WIMMA Labilaisille vaikka eväsretki puistoon ja kerro minkälaista on työskennellä yrityksessäsi. Tutustu opiskelijoihin rennon jutustelun merkeissä ja rekrytoi samalla sopivimmat osaajat mukaan tiimiisi – rekrytointihan onnistuu parhaiten vatsa täynnä.
p-guest-lectures: Company visitors can come to the WIMMA Lab to share their knowledge about the topics of assignments or about general project work. At the same time, its easy to promote company to students.
p-mentoring: Come to help future champions! For example, you can assist teams with challenging technical issues, share tips, or inspire, encourage, and help students to move forward. At the same time, you get to know the students more personally.
h2-events: Your company will have the opportunity to be featured at the following events
p-events-kettuketer: The company will have the opportunity to introduce themselves and participate in the evening's events and to offer dining and a couple of beers to WIMMA Lab participants . Budget ~ 1000 €.
p-events-kaunailta: Your company can host a project-ending sauna night for the whole group, and offers, for example, pizzas, beers, and a sauna. Budget ~ 2000 €.
p-participating-tips: Tip: join forces! Consortia are always welcome.
h2-experiences: Experiences from the previous Wimma labs
p-experience-1: “Lorem ipsum on 1500-luvulta lähtien olemassa ollut teksti, jota käytetään usein täytetekstinä ulkoasun testaamiseen graafisessa suunnittelussa, kun oikeata tekstisisältöä ei vielä ole.”
p-experience-2: “Lorem ipsum on 1500-luvulta lähtien olemassa ollut teksti, jota käytetään usein täytetekstinä ulkoasun testaamiseen graafisessa suunnittelussa, kun oikeata tekstisisältöä ei vielä ole.”
p-experience-3: “Lorem ipsum on 1500-luvulta lähtien olemassa ollut teksti, jota käytetään usein täytetekstinä ulkoasun testaamiseen graafisessa suunnittelussa, kun oikeata tekstisisältöä ei vielä ole.”
h2-contact-us: Get in touch and succeed in student recruitment!
